data.title: Faith Global Methodist Church of Delmont
meta_keywords: Faith Global Methodist Church Delmont Pennsylvania
data.meta_description: Access Sunday Bulletins, Faith Flyer newsletters, and on-demand videos of Sunday services and weekly devotions.
data.text:
As a means to better educate the congregation regarding the United Methodist Church split,

our Disaffiliation Task Force decided to show a series of six videos.

Click each title to go to YouTube to watch the videos.

A Bishop's view of the Global Methodist Church --

Bishop Mark Webb recently resigned from his position in the UMC and transferred into the Global Methodist Church, retaining his episcopal title. An interview with Bishop Webb is available on YouTube. In the video he offers information on the progress and growth of the Global MC, as well as stating some basic clear commitments of the new denomination. You can view the video by clicking on this link
